snippet: Coach Jim Harbaugh’s stony personality has rubbed off on quarterback Colin Kaepernick. In the playoffs, Harbaugh is gambling that his penchant for winning will, too.
abstract: San Francisco 49ers quarterback Colin Kaepernick, busy preparing with team for upcoming playoff game against Green Bay Packers, has acquired much of his coach Jim Harbaugh's stony personality, remaining terse in interviews; popularity of both men, based on victories rather than personality, remains at stake during the playoffs.
lead_paragraph: Coach Jim Harbaugh’s stony personality has rubbed off on quarterback Colin Kaepernick. In the playoffs, Harbaugh is gambling that his penchant for winning will, too.

headline.seo: With 49ers, Teacher’s Grade Hinges on Student’s Playoff Test
headline.main: Teacher’s Grade Hinges on Student’s Playoff Test
headline.print_headline: Teacher’s Grade Hinges on Student’s Playoff Test
